channel.title: Project-Exile Release [Pk source]
channel.description:
Some retard called Rodneyyy bought the source and then decided to release it so I thought that I may as well just release it my self and get credits instead of retard getting them lol.. But anyhow this is my second release, my previous release has like 15k+ thread views last time I checked and over 2.5k downloads
Server Package Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?0ndpc4f5o82qv20
Some features: Flawless item switching configured both server and client sided Perfected combat (Main feature to be honest, it's an amazing combat base just needs a few bugs fixing but all formulas and pretty damn flawless) Good stability (I held 125 players on a 1GB ram Vps) All updated interfaces with correct hovers and such A skill base for all skills and some skills worked on A lot more but can't be bothered wasting my time listing them just download the source... Perfect item switches for amazing hybridding. ::Master and ::Pure for combat stats but you have to train your non-combat stats to battle it out for that #1 position on the highscores. Perfect combat formulas almost identical to Rs. 100% Hitmarks and critical hits. Custom rank crowns including a custom Donator crown. A unique Donator zone with many Donator benefits. All skills fully working and being worked on every day. Daily server and website updates. A hard working owner who listens to his players. Pk Points for killing players and Voting Points both with amazing reward shops. Dungeon Minigame a custom minigame made by me, still needs a lot of work though.
[table] [tr] [td][youtube] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IUXbR6tTkfE[/youtube] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/dclawspec.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/customskillingstuff.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/clanchatdicing.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/bosses-2.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/interfaces.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/donatorzone-3.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/votingshop.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/508mapsandnewitems.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/Bork.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/50players.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]

item.title: Project-Exile Release [Pk source]
item.dc:creator: @raw_envyy raw envyy
item.description:
@raw_envyy wrote:

Some retard called Rodneyyy bought the source and then decided to release it so I thought that I may as well just release it my self and get credits instead of retard getting them lol… But anyhow this is my second release, my previous release has like 15k+ thread views last time I checked and over 2.5k downloads

Server Package Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?0ndpc4f5o82qv20

Some features:
Flawless item switching configured both server and client sided
Perfected combat (Main feature to be honest, it’s an amazing combat base just needs a few bugs fixing but all formulas and pretty damn flawless)
Good stability (I held 125 players on a 1GB ram Vps)
All updated interfaces with correct hovers and such
A skill base for all skills and some skills worked on
A lot more but can’t be bothered wasting my time listing them just download the source…
Perfect item switches for amazing hybridding.
::Master and ::Pure for combat stats but you have to train your non-combat stats to battle it out for that #1 position on the highscores.
Perfect combat formulas almost identical to Rs.
100% Hitmarks and critical hits.
Custom rank crowns including a custom Donator crown.
A unique Donator zone with many Donator benefits.
All skills fully working and being worked on every day.
Daily server and website updates.
A hard working owner who listens to his players.
Pk Points for killing players and Voting Points both with amazing reward shops.
Dungeon Minigame a custom minigame made by me, still needs a lot of work though.
